Articles.Content:
Hi there.

Happy new customer of KSP.

I've got the hang of getting into orbit with the help of a couple of walkthroughs and I see people clicking on apoapsis etc and setting manoeuvres.

I can't get any dialogue to pop up when I'm clicking on apoapsis, much less get those handy orbit management options coming up.

Only time I've been able to do this was using the Space X template on the sandbox mode - is there some piece of equipment or a skill that I'm not using on my rocket that I should be?

Thanks for your time.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-17T21:24:04Z" title="05/17/2015 09:24  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 17, 2015</time> by AidenEdmonds**
You need to upgrade buildings for this in career mode. I think that tier II tracking station and mission control is needed.

Fantastic, thanks.

Feared I had an install error.
